summary: One day a young boy finds a fossil of trilobite. Together with his three friends they set off on an adventurous journey through prehistory, up to the beginning of time.
cast: Vladimír Bejval|Petr Herrman|Zdenek Hustak|Josef Lukás|James Lucas|Victor Betral|Charles Goldsmith|Petr Herrmann|Kerry Mark Joels
title: Cesta do praveku
